channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Collapsing road, 11th July
item.description:
A large area of this road has fallen apart. I think because of a constant slow water leak which has been going on for some time. The road is in an extremely bad state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken tree support, 11th July
item.description:
There is a broken tree support frame lying on the ground outside No.8 Willersey Road, Benhall, Cheltenham. Looks as though the bottom has rotted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Willersey Road, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge Overgrown, 11th July
item.description:
At junction of Vale Road and Gotherington lane. Verge needs cutting back. Very dangerous pulling out of Vale Road as can’t see traffic coming up Gotherington Lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Lane, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Glass in road, 9th July
item.description:
A significant amount of glass is in the road, on the junction between Leckhampton Hill and the A436 at the Air Balloon roundabout. It wasn't there at 5am this morning (Sunday 9th july) but has appeared during the day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Footpath / public right of way obstructed by brambles / overgrowth, 9th July
item.description:

item.title: Pavement Parking Outside Co-op, 9th July
item.description:
Vehicles are regularly parking on the pavement, on the keep clear areas in peak times blocking the pavement. This is usually when children are walking to school making it incredibly dangerous. People with disabilities or prams could not pass due to the amount of pavement parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Single yellow line worn away, 9th July
item.description:
The single yellow line cannot be seen any longer meaning vehicles are regularly blocking the road by parking here when using the Co-op.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole and Shurdington Nurseries hedge, 8th July
item.description:
Very deep potholes along Dark Lane. Also vehicles to avoid Shurdington Nurseries hedge which they never cut are driving off the opposite side of the lanes tarmac creating a deep rut, which it is becoming difficult to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
